DAN MORRILL wrote:
> Hi folks,
>
> Hopefully not too many firewalls or othe=
r interception systems will stop
> this e-mail. The windows launch batch fi=
le I am using is below, cut and
> paste into heritrix.bat and that should g=
et the thing up and going. It is
> set for the D drive, pathing and drive l=
etters can be changed. I 
> extracted
> to the root of the D drive. if you =
have to use something like c:\program
> files\hertitrix, you have to enclos=
e the entire path in quotes. Which 
> is why
> I extracted to D:\directory\=
directory rather than "c:\program
> files\heritrix" (please note quotes).
>=

Thanks for the below Dan.

Because its all hard-codings of path-to-heritri=
x and the libs in use, 
I'd rather not check it in -- it'd be too hard to m=
aintain going 
forward.  Lets let it hang here in the list as an example fo=
r others 
making up a windows launch script (Pardon me, I just noticed this=
 is the 
second time you've pasted up this bat file).  Maybe some one else =
will 
find time to contribute a .bat file that allows setting HERITRIX_HOME=
 
outside the script or that can figure current working directory as 
HERIT=
RIX_HOME and that does an iteration over the content of the lib 
directory =
to build up a CLASSPATH (with handling for lines that are too 
long).  Mayb=
e such a launch script is not possible?

St.Ack

> cheer/s/r/Dan
>
> ------=
----------------begin batch file----------------------------------
>
> set =
HERITRIX_HOME=3Dd:\heritrix
> set
> CLASSPATH=3Dd:\heritrix\heritrix-1.6.0.=
jar;d:\heritrix\lib\ant-1.6.2.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\colt-subset-1.2.0.kb.jar;=
d:\heritrix\lib\commons-cli-1.0.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-codec-1.3.jar;d=
:\heritrix\lib\commons-collections-3.1.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-httpclie=
nt-3.0-rc3.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\commons-logging-1.0.4.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\co=
mmons-pool-1.2.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\concurrent-1.3.2.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\dns=
java-1.6.2.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\dsi-unimi-it-1.0.0.kb.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\it=
ext-1.2.0.jar;d:\heretrix\lib\j5compat-0.1.0.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\jasper-com=
piler-tomcat-4.1.30.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\jasper-runtime-tomcat-4.1.30.jar;d:=
\heritrix\lib\javaswf-CVS-SNAPSHOT-1.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\je-2.0.90.jar;d:\h=
eritrix\lib\jetty-4.2.23.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\jmxri-1.2.1.jar;d:\heritrix\li=
b\jmxtools-1.2.1.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\junit-3.8.1.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\libidn=
-0.5.9.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\MirrorJNDI-
> 1.0.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\poi-2.0-RC=
1-20031102.jar;d:\heritrix\lib\poi-scratchpad-2.0-RC1-20031102.jar;d:\herit=
rix\lib\servlet-tomcat-4.1.30.jar
> java -Xmx256m org.archive.crawler.Herit=
rix
>
> -------------------------------------end batch
> file--------------=
----------------------
